!Trader Astrid: It is wise to be careful in your purchasing. Not everything that glitters is gold, after all! That is especially true for accessories. You cannot judge a book by its cover. In fact, that is even true for people. Do you see Mr. Kendis, the Dwarf? He may look like a child, but he's even older than me!
